text: Marion Tardy (born 12 July 1993 in Saint-Jean-d'Angély) is a French water polo player. She was a member of the France women's national water polo team. She participated at the 2015 World Aquatics Championships. On the club level, she played for Lille Métropole Water-Polo. == References == Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:French water polo players Category:People from Charente-Maritime Category:Sportspeople from Nouvelle-Aquitaine
title: Marion Tardy
